text: Luis Guillermo Eichhorn (26 June 1942 - 25 May 2022) was an Argentine Roman Catholic bishop. Eichhorn was born in Gilbert, Entre Ríos, Argentina. He became a priest in 1968. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Gualeguaychú, Argentina, from 1996 to 2004 and as bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Morón, Argentina from 2004 until his retirement in 2017. Eichhorn was born in Gilbert, Argentina. Eichhorn died on 25 May 2022 in Gualeguaychú, Argentina from cardiac arrest at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Argentine Roman Catholic bishops
title: Luis Guillermo Eichhorn
